subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In 1969, the franchise of Ruth, Gehrig and DiMaggio was in a decline not seen in more than five decades. But in a strange way to a boy on Long Island, that team was still worth loving.
snippet: In 1969, the franchise of Ruth, Gehrig and DiMaggio was in a decline not seen in more than five decades. But in a strange way to a boy on Long Island, that team was still worth loving.
